title: Using messenger while playing
body:
Just something I noticed last few days, but never really bothered to figure it out involving messenger when the client goes into a game..

When the pre-game lobby is done loading and begins to load the actual match I've come to notice that when I'm in a call on messenger or even receiving notifications I can't hear the person on the other end of the call nor can they hear me.. As well as with my notifications I get no sound or alert for them.

Is this suppose to be intentional with the client, and is there a way for me to fix this so I can freely use Messenger calling while playing a match?

replies.body: That sounds super frustrating and it's a crappy situation when you're in a call and it hangs up on you, but we don't support third party messaging applications!  You'll have to contact your messaging system to see if there is something they can do to assist with the issue!
